short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Image translate' uses built-in chrome or/and ‘OpenAI’ technology to identify the language and translate the text in the image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension identifies the language of the text in an image and translates it into English. The extension allows you to upload an existing picture or open the camera and take a picture. If there is any text in the image, it identifies the language and translates it to English. If there are no texts to translate, the extension provides the information that there is no text to translate into English.
